user.title: ISIN Quotes
user.description: Enter an ISIN to look up available exchanges.

select.title: Select exchange & currency
select.description: Choose the exchange and currency, and set the refresh interval.

error.cannot_connect: Could not reach the ING API.
error.no_exchanges: No exchanges returned for this ISIN.

render_logo.name: Render logo
render_logo.description: Fetch the security logo, render/cache it once to /local/isin_quotes/, and log the local URL.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: Config entry_id of the ISIN Quotes entry (preferred).

isin.name: ISIN
isin.description: ISIN of the target security (used if entry_id is not provided).

asset_class.name: Asset class (EN)
asset_class.description: Optional. If omitted, it will be derived from additionalMetaInformation.

fetch_history.name: Fetch & cache historical data
fetch_history.description: Fetch historical chart data from ING and store a JSON under /config/www/isin_quotes/history. Intraday is always fetched fresh; other ranges are cached per day.

isin.name: ISIN
isin.description: ISIN to fetch the history for.

time_range.name: Time range
time_range.description: One of Intraday, OneWeek, OneMonth, OneYear, FiveYears, Maximum.

exchange_id.name: Exchange ID
exchange_id.description: Numeric exchangeId as required by the ING endpoint.

currency_id.name: Currency ID
currency_id.description: Numeric currencyId as required by the ING endpoint.

ohlc.name: OHLC mode
ohlc.description: If true, fetch x,open,high,low,close (not available for Intraday).
